align.string_process:
process align {
    module 'bwa/bwa-0.7.17'
    cpus 26
    publishDir 'bams'
    memory '225 GB'

    input:
    set sra_id, file(reads) from short_reads

    output:
    file "${sra_id}.bam" into bam

    """
    bwa mem -t ${task.cpus} ${params.assembly} ${reads} | \
        samtools view -bh - | samtools fixmate -m - - | \
        samtools sort -T . -@ ${task.cpus} -m 2G - | \
        samtools markdup - ${sra_id}.bam
    """
}
align.string_script:
"""
    bwa mem -t ${task.cpus} ${params.assembly} ${reads} | \
        samtools view -bh - | samtools fixmate -m - - | \
        samtools sort -T . -@ ${task.cpus} -m 2G - | \
        samtools markdup - ${sra_id}.bam
    """

tools_dico.name: BWA
tools_dico.description: Fast, accurate, memory-efficient aligner for short and long sequencing reads

tools_dico.name: SAMtools
tools_dico.description: A software package with various utilities for processing alignments in the SAM format, including variant calling and alignment viewing.

mergeBams.string_process:
process mergeBams {
    memory '128 GB'
    publishDir 'alignments'

    input:
    file "*.bam" from aligned.collect()

    output:
    file "merged.bam" into merged
    file "merged.bam.bai" into mergedIndex

    """
    samtools merge merged.bam *.bam
    samtools index merged.bam
    """
}
mergeBams.string_script:
"""
    samtools merge merged.bam *.bam
    samtools index merged.bam
    """

tools_dico.name: SAMtools
tools_dico.description: A software package with various utilities for processing alignments in the SAM format, including variant calling and alignment viewing.

pepper.string_process:
process pepper {
    cpus 56
    memory '0'
    container 'kishwars/pepper:latest'
    publishDir 'pepper_out'
    clusterOptions = '--exclusive --account=johnsonlab'

    input:
    file "contigs.fa" from reference
    file "merged.bam" from merged
    file "merged.bam.bai" from mergedIndex

    output:
    file('pepper_out') into pepperOut

    """
    mkdir pepper_out
    pepper download_models -o models
    pepper polish -b merged.bam -f contigs.fa \
        -m models/pepper_r941_guppy344_human.pkl \
        -o pepper_out/pepper_out -tpc 7 -c 8 -t ${task.cpus}
    """
}
pepper.string_script:
"""
    mkdir pepper_out
    pepper download_models -o models
    pepper polish -b merged.bam -f contigs.fa \
        -m models/pepper_r941_guppy344_human.pkl \
        -o pepper_out/pepper_out -tpc 7 -c 8 -t ${task.cpus}
    """

tools_dico.name: Pepper
tools_dico.description: Plugin which finds meaningful pathways / complexes connecting a protein set members within a PPI-network using multi-objective optimization.

fasta_index.string_process:
process fasta_index {
    input:
    file 'dam.fa' from damReference
    file 'sire.fa' from sireReference

    output:
    file "dam.fa.fai" into damFaidx
    file "sire.fa.fai" into sireFaidx

    """
    samtools faidx dam.fa
    samtools faidx sire.fa
    """
}
fasta_index.string_script:
"""
    samtools faidx dam.fa
    samtools faidx sire.fa
    """

tools_dico.name: SAMtools
tools_dico.description: A software package with various utilities for processing alignments in the SAM format, including variant calling and alignment viewing.

bwaIndex.string_process:
process bwaIndex {
    module 'bwa'
    publishDir 'bwa_idx'
    memory '325 GB'
    cpus 2

    input:
    file 'dam.fa' from damReference
    file 'sire.fa' from sireReference

    output:
    file 'dam.fa*' into damIndex
    file 'sire.fa*' into sireIndex

    """
    bwa index dam.fa &
    bwa index sire.fa &
    wait
    """
}
bwaIndex.string_script:
"""
    bwa index dam.fa &
    bwa index sire.fa &
    wait
    """

tools_dico.name: BWA
tools_dico.description: Fast, accurate, memory-efficient aligner for short and long sequencing reads

alignDam.string_process:
process alignDam {
    module 'bwa/bwa-0.7.17:samtools/samtools-1.9'
    publishDir 'unclassified'
    cpus 14
    memory '125 GB'

    input:
    file idx from damIndex
    set( val (id), file (fastqs) ) from hicReadsDam

    output:
    set (val(id), file("dam.${id}.unclassified.bam")) into damBamsUnclassified

    """
    bwa mem -t ${task.cpus} dam.fa ${fastqs} | samtools view -bh - \
        | samtools sort -n - > dam.${id}.unclassified.bam
    """
}
alignDam.string_script:
"""
    bwa mem -t ${task.cpus} dam.fa ${fastqs} | samtools view -bh - \
        | samtools sort -n - > dam.${id}.unclassified.bam
    """

tools_dico.name: BWA
tools_dico.description: Fast, accurate, memory-efficient aligner for short and long sequencing reads

tools_dico.name: SAMtools
tools_dico.description: A software package with various utilities for processing alignments in the SAM format, including variant calling and alignment viewing.

alignSire.string_process:
process alignSire {
    module 'bwa/bwa-0.7.17:samtools/samtools-1.9'
    publishDir 'unclassified'
    cpus 14
    memory '125 GB'

    input:
    file idx from sireIndex
    set( val (id), file (fastqs)) from hicReadsSire

    output:
    set (val(id), file("sire.${id}.unclassified.bam")) into sireBamsUnclassified

    """
    bwa mem -t ${task.cpus} sire.fa ${fastqs} | samtools view -bh - \
        | samtools sort -n - > sire.${id}.unclassified.bam
    """
}
alignSire.string_script:
"""
    bwa mem -t ${task.cpus} sire.fa ${fastqs} | samtools view -bh - \
        | samtools sort -n - > sire.${id}.unclassified.bam
    """

tools_dico.name: BWA
tools_dico.description: Fast, accurate, memory-efficient aligner for short and long sequencing reads

tools_dico.name: SAMtools
tools_dico.description: A software package with various utilities for processing alignments in the SAM format, including variant calling and alignment viewing.

classify.string_process:
process classify {
    publishDir 'classified'

    input:
    set(val(id), file(damBam), file(sireBam)) from damSireUnclassified

    output:
    tuple(val(id), file("dam.${id}.classified.bam")) into damClassified
    tuple(val(id), file("sire.${id}.classified.bam")) into sireClassified

    """
    classify_by_alignment --hapA-in ${damBam} \
        --hapA-out dam.${id}.classified.bam \
        --hapB-in ${sireBam} \
        --hapB-out sire.${id}.classified.bam
    """
}

filter_chimeras.string_process:
process filter_chimeras {
    cpus 2
    container 'esrice/hic-pipeline:latest'

    input:
    tuple(val(parent), val(id), file("${parent}.${id}.bam")) from allClassified

    output:
    tuple(val(parent),
          val(id),
          file("forward.${parent}.${id}.bam"),
          file("reverse.${parent}.${id}.bam")) into filteredBams

    """
    samtools view -bh -f64 ${parent}.${id}.bam | filter_chimeras.py - \
        > forward.${parent}.${id}.bam &
    samtools view -bh -f128 ${parent}.${id}.bam | filter_chimeras.py - \
        > reverse.${parent}.${id}.bam &
    wait
    """
}
filter_chimeras.string_script:
"""
    samtools view -bh -f64 ${parent}.${id}.bam | filter_chimeras.py - \
        > forward.${parent}.${id}.bam &
    samtools view -bh -f128 ${parent}.${id}.bam | filter_chimeras.py - \
        > reverse.${parent}.${id}.bam &
    wait
    """

tools_dico.name: SAMtools
tools_dico.description: A software package with various utilities for processing alignments in the SAM format, including variant calling and alignment viewing.

combine.string_process:
process combine {
    container 'esrice/hic-pipeline:latest'
    publishDir 'alignments'

    input:
    tuple(val(parent), val(id),
          file("r1.bam"),
          file("r2.bam")) from filteredBams

    output:
    tuple(val(parent), file("combined.${parent}.${id}.bed")) into combinedBeds

    """
    combine_ends.py r1.bam r2.bam | samtools fixmate -m - - \
        | samtools sort - | samtools markdup -r - combined.bam
    bedtools bamtobed -i combined.bam > combined.${parent}.${id}.bed
    """
}
combine.string_script:
"""
    combine_ends.py r1.bam r2.bam | samtools fixmate -m - - \
        | samtools sort - | samtools markdup -r - combined.bam
    bedtools bamtobed -i combined.bam > combined.${parent}.${id}.bed
    """

tools_dico.name: SAMtools
tools_dico.description: A software package with various utilities for processing alignments in the SAM format, including variant calling and alignment viewing.

tools_dico.name: BEDTools
tools_dico.description: BEDTools is an extensive suite of utilities for comparing genomic features in BED format.

salsaDam.string_process:
process salsaDam {
    container 'esrice/hic-pipeline:latest'
    publishDir 'dam_out'

    input:
    file 'ref.fa' from damReference
    file 'ref.fa.fai' from damFaidx
    file beds from damBeds.collect()

    output:
    file 'salsa/*' into salsa_dam

    """
    cat ${beds} | sort -k 4 -T ${params.scratch} > all.bed
    python \$SALSA_DIR/run_pipeline.py -a ref.fa -l ref.fa.fai \
        -b all.bed -e ${params.enzyme} -o salsa -m yes -i 10 -p yes
    """
}
salsaDam.string_script:
"""
    cat ${beds} | sort -k 4 -T ${params.scratch} > all.bed
    python \$SALSA_DIR/run_pipeline.py -a ref.fa -l ref.fa.fai \
        -b all.bed -e ${params.enzyme} -o salsa -m yes -i 10 -p yes
    """

salsaSire.string_process:
process salsaSire {
    container 'esrice/hic-pipeline:latest'
    publishDir 'sire_out'

    input:
    file 'ref.fa' from sireReference
    file 'ref.fa.fai' from sireFaidx
    file beds from sireBeds.collect()

    output:
    file 'salsa/*' into salsa_sire

    """
    cat ${beds} | sort -k 4 -T ${params.scratch} > all.bed
    python \$SALSA_DIR/run_pipeline.py -a ref.fa -l ref.fa.fai \
        -b all.bed -e ${params.enzyme} -o salsa -m yes -i 10 -p yes
    """
}
salsaSire.string_script:
"""
    cat ${beds} | sort -k 4 -T ${params.scratch} > all.bed
    python \$SALSA_DIR/run_pipeline.py -a ref.fa -l ref.fa.fai \
        -b all.bed -e ${params.enzyme} -o salsa -m yes -i 10 -p yes
    """

bwa_index.string_process:
process bwa_index {
    publishDir 'bwa_index'
    module 'bwa/bwa-0.7.17'

    input:
    file reference from reference_file

    output:
    file "${reference}.*" into reference_index

    """ bwa index ${reference} """
}

samtools_faidx.string_process:
process samtools_faidx {
    module 'samtools/samtools-1.9'

    input:
    file reference from reference_file

    output:
    file "${reference}.fai" into faidx

    """ samtools faidx ${reference} """
}

manta.string_process:
process manta {
    cpus 16
    module 'biocompute/biocompute-modules'
    module 'manta/manta-1.6.0'
    publishDir 'results'

    input:
    file 'ref.fa' from reference_file
    file 'ref.fa.fai' from faidx
    file bams from aligned.collect()
    file bais from aligned_index.collect()

    output:
    file "manta*" into results

    """
    bams=""; for bam in ${bams}; do bams+="--bam \$bam "; done
    configManta.py \$bams --referenceFasta ref.fa --runDir manta
    manta/runWorkflow.py -j ${task.cpus}
    """
}
manta.string_script:
"""
    bams=""; for bam in ${bams}; do bams+="--bam \$bam "; done
    configManta.py \$bams --referenceFasta ref.fa --runDir manta
    manta/runWorkflow.py -j ${task.cpus}
    """

faidx.string_process:
process faidx {
    input:
    file 'ref.fa' from reference

    output:
    file 'ref.fa.fai' into referenceFaidx

    """
    samtools faidx ref.fa
    """
}

tools_dico.name: SAMtools
tools_dico.description: A software package with various utilities for processing alignments in the SAM format, including variant calling and alignment viewing.

racon.string_process:
process racon {
    cpus 16
    memory '64 GB'

    input:
    set val(ctg),
        file('ref.fa.fai'),
        file('all.bam'),
        file('all.bam.bai') from contigsRefBam
    file 'ref.fa' from reference

    output:
    file("${ctg}_corrected.fa") into corrected

    """
    samtools faidx ref.fa $ctg > contig.fa
    samtools view all.bam $ctg > contig.sam
    samtools fastq contig.sam > contig.fastq
    racon -t ${task.cpus} contig.fastq contig.sam contig.fa \
        > ${ctg}_corrected.fa
    """
}
racon.string_script:
"""
    samtools faidx ref.fa $ctg > contig.fa
    samtools view all.bam $ctg > contig.sam
    samtools fastq contig.sam > contig.fastq
    racon -t ${task.cpus} contig.fastq contig.sam contig.fa \
        > ${ctg}_corrected.fa
    """

tools_dico.name: SAMtools
tools_dico.description: A software package with various utilities for processing alignments in the SAM format, including variant calling and alignment viewing.

tools_dico.name: Racon
tools_dico.description: The Possibility to Use Oxford Nanopore Technology | Ultrafast consensus module for raw de novo genome assembly of long uncorrected reads. http://genome.cshlp.org/content/early/2017/01/18/gr.214270.116 Note: This was the original repository which will no longer be officially maintained. Please use the new official repository here: | Racon is intended as a standalone consensus module to correct raw contigs generated by rapid assembly methods which do not include a consensus step | Consensus module for raw de novo DNA assembly of long uncorrected reads

catContigs.string_process:
process catContigs {
    publishDir 'out'

    input:
    file "*_corrected.fa" from corrected.collect()

    output:
    file "corrected.fa" into correctedCatted

    """
    cat *_corrected.fa > corrected.fa
    """
}

make_reference.string_process:
process make_reference {
    input:
    file 'ref.fa' from reference_fasta

    output:
    file 'ref.xml' into reference_xml

    """
    dataset create --type ReferenceSet --generateIndices ref.xml ref.fa
    """
}

tools_dico.name: MultiDataSet
tools_dico.description: Implementation of the BRGE's (Bioinformatic Research Group in Epidemiology from Center for Research in Environmental Epidemiology) dataset and MethylationSet. It is designed for integrating multi omics data sets and MethylationSet to contain normalized methylation data. These package contains base classes for MEAL and rexposome packages.

split_by_contig.string_process:
process split_by_contig {
    input:
    file '*.aln.bam' from aligned.collect()

    output:
    file 'all_aligned.*.xml' into aligned_split

    """
    dataset create --generateIndices --type AlignmentSet \
        all_aligned.xml *.aln.bam
    dataset split --contig --chunks $params.numChunks all_aligned.xml
    """
}
split_by_contig.string_script:
"""
    dataset create --generateIndices --type AlignmentSet \
        all_aligned.xml *.aln.bam
    dataset split --contig --chunks $params.numChunks all_aligned.xml
    """

tools_dico.name: MultiDataSet
tools_dico.description: Implementation of the BRGE's (Bioinformatic Research Group in Epidemiology from Center for Research in Environmental Epidemiology) dataset and MethylationSet. It is designed for integrating multi omics data sets and MethylationSet to contain normalized methylation data. These package contains base classes for MEAL and rexposome packages.

arrow.string_process:
process arrow {
    cpus 16

    input:
    file 'ref.xml' from reference_xml_for_arrow
    file aligned_chunk from aligned_split.flatten()

    output:
    file "${aligned_chunk.baseName}.fa" into fasta_chunks
    file "${aligned_chunk.baseName}.fq" into fastq_chunks

    """
    gcpp $aligned_chunk -j ${task.cpus} -q 20 -r ref.xml \
        -o ${aligned_chunk.baseName}.fa,${aligned_chunk.baseName}.fq
    """
}

merge.string_process:
process merge {
    input:
    file bams from bam.collect()

    output:
    file("merged.bam") into mergedBam

    """
    bams="${bams}"
    words=( \$bams )
    if [[ "1" == "\${#words[@]}" ]]; then
        cp ${bams} merged.bam
    else
        samtools merge merged.bam ${bams}
    fi
    """
}
merge.string_script:
"""
    bams="${bams}"
    words=( \$bams )
    if [[ "1" == "\${#words[@]}" ]]; then
        cp ${bams} merged.bam
    else
        samtools merge merged.bam ${bams}
    fi
    """

tools_dico.name: SAMtools
tools_dico.description: A software package with various utilities for processing alignments in the SAM format, including variant calling and alignment viewing.

marginpolish.string_process:
process marginpolish {
    cpus 56
    memory '0'
    container 'kishwars/helen:latest'
    publishDir 'mp_out'
    clusterOptions = '--exclusive --account=johnsonlab'

    input:
    file "contigs.fa" from reference
    file "merged.bam" from merged
    file "merged.bam.bai" from mergedIndex

    output:
    file('mp_out') into mpOut

    """
    mkdir mp_out
    helen download_models -o models
    marginpolish merged.bam contigs.fa models/MP_r941_guppy344_human.json \
        -o mp_out/mp_out -t ${task.cpus} -f
    """
}
marginpolish.string_script:
"""
    mkdir mp_out
    helen download_models -o models
    marginpolish merged.bam contigs.fa models/MP_r941_guppy344_human.json \
        -o mp_out/mp_out -t ${task.cpus} -f
    """

helen.string_process:
process helen {
    cpus 16
    memory '200 GB'
    container 'kishwars/helen:latest'
    publishDir 'helen_out'

    input:
    file "mp_out" from mpOut

    output:
    file('helen_out') into corrected

    """
    helen download_models -o models
    helen polish -i mp_out/ -m models/HELEN_r941_guppy344_human.pkl \
        -t ${task.cpus} -o helen_out
    """
}
helen.string_script:
"""
    helen download_models -o models
    helen polish -i mp_out/ -m models/HELEN_r941_guppy344_human.pkl \
        -t ${task.cpus} -o helen_out
    """

smoove_call.string_process:
process smoove_call {
    container 'brentp/smoove:v0.2.3'
    publishDir 'unmerged'
    cpus 8

    input:
    file 'ref.fa' from reference_file
    file 'ref.fa.fai' from faidx_for_smoove_call
    set accession, file(bam) from aligned_for_smoove_call

    output:
    file "${accession}-smoove.genotyped.vcf.gz" into unmerged

    """
    smoove call --name ${accession} --fasta ref.fa -p ${task.cpus} \
        --genotype ${accession}.bam
    """
}

smoove_merge.string_process:
process smoove_merge {
    container 'brentp/smoove:v0.2.3'

    input:
    file 'ref.fa' from reference_file
    file 'ref.fa.fai' from faidx_for_smoove_merge
    file all_unmerged from unmerged.collect()

    output:
    file "merged.sites.vcf.gz" into merged

    """
    smoove merge --name merged -f ref.fa ${all_unmerged}
    """
}

smoove_genotype.string_process:
process smoove_genotype {
    container 'brentp/smoove:v0.2.3'

    input:
    file 'ref.fa' from reference_file
    set 'merged.sites.vcf.gz', 'ref.fa.fai', accession,
        file(bam) from merged_vcf_faidx_and_bams

    output:
    file "${accession}-joint-smoove.genotyped.vcf.gz" into joint_genotyped
    file "${accession}-joint-smoove.genotyped.vcf.gz.csi" into j_g_index

    """
    export TMPDIR=\$PWD
    smoove genotype -d -x --name ${accession}-joint --fasta ref.fa \
        --vcf merged.sites.vcf.gz ${accession}.bam
    echo "done!"
    """
}
smoove_genotype.string_script:
"""
    export TMPDIR=\$PWD
    smoove genotype -d -x --name ${accession}-joint --fasta ref.fa \
        --vcf merged.sites.vcf.gz ${accession}.bam
    echo "done!"
    """

smoove_paste.string_process:
process smoove_paste {
    container 'brentp/smoove:v0.2.3'
    publishDir 'output'

    input:
    file all_vcfs from joint_genotyped.collect()
    file all_indexes from j_g_index.collect()

    output:
    file "pasted.smoove.square.vcf.gz" into pasted

    """
    smoove paste --name pasted ${all_vcfs}
    """
}

freebayes.string_process:
process freebayes {
    module 'bcftools/bcftools-1.8'

    input:
    set file("merged.bam"), val(region) from bam_and_regions

    output:
    file "${region.name}.bcf" into region_bcfs

    """
    samtools index merged.bam
    freebayes --bam merged.bam --region ${region.name}:1-${region.length} \
        --skip-coverage 500 -f ${params.assembly} \
        | bcftools view --no-version -Ob -o ${region.name}.bcf
    """
}
freebayes.string_script:
"""
    samtools index merged.bam
    freebayes --bam merged.bam --region ${region.name}:1-${region.length} \
        --skip-coverage 500 -f ${params.assembly} \
        | bcftools view --no-version -Ob -o ${region.name}.bcf
    """

tools_dico.name: SAMtools
tools_dico.description: A software package with various utilities for processing alignments in the SAM format, including variant calling and alignment viewing.

tools_dico.name: FreeBayes
tools_dico.description: Bayesian genetic variant detector designed to find small polymorphisms, specifically SNPs, indels, multi-nucleotide polymorphisms, and complex events (composite insertion and substitution events) smaller than the length of a short-read sequencing alignment.

tools_dico.name: BCFtools
tools_dico.description: Set of utilities that manipulate variant calls in the Variant Call Format (VCF) and its binary counterpart BCF. All commands work transparently with both VCFs and BCFs, both uncompressed and BGZF-compressed.

concat_and_consensus.string_process:
process concat_and_consensus {
    module 'bcftools/bcftools-1.8'
    publishDir 'consensus'

    input:
    file "*.bcf" from region_bcfs.collect()

    output:
    file "polished.fa" into polished
    file "joined.bcf" into variants
    file "report.txt" into report

    """
    bcftools concat -n *.bcf | bcftools view -Ou -e'type="ref"' \
        | bcftools norm -Ob -f ${params.assembly} -o joined.bcf
    bcftools index joined.bcf
    bcftools consensus -i'QUAL>1 && (GT="AA" || GT="Aa")' \
        -Hla -f ${params.assembly} joined.bcf > polished.fa

    snp=\$(bcftools view -i'QUAL>1 && (GT="AA" || GT="Aa")' \
        -Ha joined.bcf | grep -c 'TYPE=snp')
    ins=\$(bcftools view -i'QUAL>1 && (GT="AA" || GT="Aa")' \
        -Ha joined.bcf | grep -c 'TYPE=ins')
    del=\$(bcftools view -i'QUAL>1 && (GT="AA" || GT="Aa")' \
        -Ha joined.bcf | grep -c 'TYPE=del')
    echo "\${snp} SNPs, \${ins} insertions, and \${del} deletions corrected." \
        > report.txt
    """
}
concat_and_consensus.string_script:
"""
    bcftools concat -n *.bcf | bcftools view -Ou -e'type="ref"' \
        | bcftools norm -Ob -f ${params.assembly} -o joined.bcf
    bcftools index joined.bcf
    bcftools consensus -i'QUAL>1 && (GT="AA" || GT="Aa")' \
        -Hla -f ${params.assembly} joined.bcf > polished.fa

    snp=\$(bcftools view -i'QUAL>1 && (GT="AA" || GT="Aa")' \
        -Ha joined.bcf | grep -c 'TYPE=snp')
    ins=\$(bcftools view -i'QUAL>1 && (GT="AA" || GT="Aa")' \
        -Ha joined.bcf | grep -c 'TYPE=ins')
    del=\$(bcftools view -i'QUAL>1 && (GT="AA" || GT="Aa")' \
        -Ha joined.bcf | grep -c 'TYPE=del')
    echo "\${snp} SNPs, \${ins} insertions, and \${del} deletions corrected." \
        > report.txt
    """

tools_dico.name: BCFtools
tools_dico.description: Set of utilities that manipulate variant calls in the Variant Call Format (VCF) and its binary counterpart BCF. All commands work transparently with both VCFs and BCFs, both uncompressed and BGZF-compressed.

find_unique_kmers.string_process:
process find_unique_kmers {
    cpus 16
    publishDir 'unique_kmers'

    input:
    file maternal from maternal_short_reads.collect()
    file paternal from paternal_short_reads.collect()

    output:
    file 'hapA_only_kmers.txt' into maternal_kmers
    file 'hapB_only_kmers.txt' into paternal_kmers

    """
    find-unique-kmers -k 20 -p 16 ${maternal.join(',')} ${paternal.join(',')}
    """
}

classify_long_reads.string_process:
process classify_long_reads {
    cpus 2
    clusterOptions '--qos long'
    time '7d'
    publishDir 'classified_reads'

    input:
    file 'maternal_kmers.txt' from maternal_kmers
    file 'paternal_kmers.txt' from paternal_kmers
    set id, file(reads_to_classify) from input_reads

    output:
    file "maternal.${id}.fq.gz" into maternal_reads
    file "paternal.${id}.fq.gz" into paternal_reads
    file "unclassified.${id}.fq.gz" into unclassified_reads

    """
    classify_by_kmers -c -i $reads_to_classify \
        -a maternal_kmers.txt -b paternal_kmers.txt \
        -A maternal.${id} -B paternal.${id} -U unclassified.${id}
    """
}
classify_long_reads.string_script:
"""
    classify_by_kmers -c -i $reads_to_classify \
        -a maternal_kmers.txt -b paternal_kmers.txt \
        -A maternal.${id} -B paternal.${id} -U unclassified.${id}
    """

assemble.string_process:
process assemble {
    clusterOptions '--qos long'
    time '7d'
    memory '12g'
    publishDir 'contigs'

    input:
    set haplotype, file("${haplotype}.*.fq.gz") from both_haplotypes

    output:
    file "${haplotype}/${haplotype}.contigs.fasta" into contigs

    """
    /storage/htc/warrenlab/esrbhb/software/canu-1.8/Linux-amd64/bin/canu \
        -p ${haplotype} -d ${haplotype} \
        genomeSize=${params.genomeSize} \
        gridOptions="-p Lewis,BioCompute -t 2-00:00:00 --account warrenlab" \
        -pacbio-raw ${haplotype}.*.fq.gz
    """
}

tools_dico.name: CANU
tools_dico.description: De-novo assembly tool for long read chemistry like Nanopore data and PacBio data.
